text_block_list.text:
We're here at the city's outskirts where the summer training 
camp took place, and among the multitude of horsegirls hard 
at work on their own regimens ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hah! Gorgeous!
(splish splash splosh!)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Huff! Elegant!!
(wooooosh!!)
T.M. Opera O was frolicking among the waves by herself.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… My dear trainer, how are you finding my graceful steps?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha! An astute observation, my dear trainer. For today's theme is no other than "releasing my inner self".

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The beach offers training opportunities beyond simple 
physical strength. A certain strength can be attained 
through expressing oneself, freeing one's inner being.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
One's wake at times elegant, and at times tempestuous. 
Observe as yours truly glides over the water's edge with 
the grace to turn mermaid's heads in envy!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I've heard of her antics but… seeing her in person is… 
really something. Not that I don't understand the desire 
to play around at the beach……

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
A-Ahaha…… It's very Opera O-esque behavior. 
Even when racing she has that air of freedom…
I could overhear such comments occasionally… however ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
This calls for a turn! Sweep up the sand with my foot and 
leap upward like a butterfly taking flight!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
White clouds, blue seas, and my handsome self weaving 
between the crashing sound of the waves! We can only enjoy 
this summer once! Hence we should use every moment of it!

—— No matter what she takes on, T.M. Opera O 
always faces it earnestly, with all she has.

Needless to say, when a horsegirl exhibits such resolute will, 
to diligently press on until her goals are met, it is her trainer's 
duty to support her every step of the way.
choice_data_list: Let's go get some stellar training in!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But of course! We won't settle for half measures!! 
The harmonious melody of yours truly and the deep 
blue will ring out over this very beach!
After training that day ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh there you are, my dear trainer.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh nothing, I simply want to request advice on a few topics.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
First of all, regarding tomorrow's regimen… 
We can meet up at 4 in the morning ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You think so? …Ah, I see! Even in summer 
the morning sun would still be rising.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It would be best to choose a slightly later time if yours truly 
is to appear silhouetted against its radiance! Very well.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… after meeting up then, yours truly will gently enter 
the sea while running a hand through her hair.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Floating through the waters like a fish among anemones, 
a beautiful synchronized dance ——
choice_data_list: Careful, those things can be poisonous.
Careful, those things can be poisonous.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that so? Then yours truly will take great care 
so as to not let her limbs, pale and slender as icefish, 
come into contact with the anemones.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And after rising from the seas again, she shall join the splashing 
of the waves in song! With a voice to charm midsummer's sirens!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It's no different from the after-race performance. One seeks 
the uplifting melody of song to effect a graceful end.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My dear beachgoing audience will be moved to tears, and surely 
send a thunderous applause my way. Ah, true perfection…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha! Great joy awaits us tomorrow, my dear trainer! This my cue to depart! Until we meet again, at training!
choice_data_list: What about the advice you wanted…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, I have no more need of that.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I carried my worries regarding some parts of training, you see. 
Confused whether I should continue the way I have.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That is why I came to you. As ever, your words exhibited your 
care and sincerity as you provided your perspective.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Simply your honest opinion as I have come to expect, unbiased, 
without judgement, never rejecting my own ideas.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I have no need to question it further. There were no flaws 
in my judgement. I can continue without fear.
choice_data_list: Is that what's been on your mind?
Is that what's been on your mind?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hm-hm, why wouldn't it be? Even yours truly has moments of uncertainty, contemplating the virtue of her actions.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Of course, as a horsegirl on the path to become The Era's 
High King, it does not become yours truly to display this side 
to simply anyone.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Isn't that what makes a king?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now, I would say it is time to prepare for tomorrow. 
Not only for myself, but also my wonderful audience.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, one more thing before I forget, my dear trainer.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Should yours truly ever seek a dialogue regarding 
her future again… will you be her partner once more?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha! Yours truly has undoubtedly found herself an extraordinary trainer. It is only fitting, of course.

It was in this way that I greeted another day full 
of T.M. Opera O's peculiar form of training.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The morning sun is out to bestow its blessings upon yours truly. 
Let us commence another glorious day of training!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Starting with letting my hair sway in the gentle sea breeze. 
Running my hands through, followed by winking back……

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha! Not a day goes by where yours truly isn't handsome!!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: …… She's at it again today. Impressive, really.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, isn't it? I'm pretty envious of her confidence though.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, no horsegirl on this beach shines brighter! 
Don't you think, my dear trainer?
choice_data_list: The one and only T.M. Opera O!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Right you are! The up and coming high king of the era 
casting her light upon the world!

T.M. Opera O confronted another day 
of training, brimming with confidence.
